title: Cat Face

verbs: Of a cat, to make its cry.
Indicate pleasure by purring; characteristic of cats
nouns: Cat communication is the transfer of information by one or more cats that has an effect on the current or future behavior of another animal, including humans.
The sound made by a cat (or any sound resembling this)
Once the world's heaviest cat
The cry of a cat.
A cat's cry.
A sound that caterwauls.
The act of producing a mew sound.
Meow, also known as Meow the fat cat, was a male domestic cat who attracted international attention due to the effort to slim him down.
Cry of a cat.
Animal kept for companionship and a person's enjoyment

A pet is an animal kept primarily for a person's company or protection, as opposed to working animals, sport animals, livestock, and laboratory animals, which are kept primarily for performance, agricultural value, or research.
An animal which is kept in the home as a companion and treated affectionately.
An animal kept as a companion.
A domesticated animal kept for companionship or amusement
A young cat. Diminutive: kitty.
A kitten or kitty is a juvenile domesticated cat.
A kitten or young cat.
A young cat.
Young domestic cat
Young of a cat

description:
Meow! A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a cat, looking straight ahead. Generally depicted as a yellowish-orange cat face with pointed ears and whiskers.

May be used with a more affectionate tone than the full-bodied ğŸˆ Cat, though their applications generally overlap.

Available as an Apple Animoji.

Google’s cat face was previously orange, Samsung’s gray, and Facebook’s once gray and white. Included in the earliest Japanese emoji sets from Softbank, Docomo, and au by KDDI.
apple_vendor_description: Appleâ€™s cat face emoji features a charming, stylized feline expression with bright, expressive eyes rendered with a glossy finish, showcasing Apple's signature 3D design. Its softly rounded features and subtle whiskers give it a friendly and approachable demeanor, embodying a playful yet endearing tone. This emoji on Apple devices is commonly used to express affection, playfulness, or a general sense of cuteness in conversations.
